column1: become_genghis_khan_desc;Isma'il the Visionary achieved what had been thought impossible - uniting the Saharan nomads into a single great horde. His Empire spread across much of North Africa
column2: but shattered upon his death. If I could reunite the nomads
column3: perhaps I could equal or exceed his achievements...;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_zapadoslavia_desc;Like the mighty Yugoslavia to the south
column2: the Western Slav brothers must unite under one banner and do away with the borders that have long divided us.;;;;;;;;;x
§YSlovakia§!
column3: §YSlovania§! and §YCroatia§! will become De Jure parts of Austria-Hungary if their De Jure territory is compleatly controled by §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_austria_hungary_desc;It is said that once upon a time the lands of the Austrians and the lands of the Hungarians where united as a single Empire
column2: and its Emperor ruled the world. Whether or not these stories are true
column3: there is no denying how useful such a title will be.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: §YSlovakia§!
column3: §YSlovania§! and §YCroatia§! will become De Jure parts of Austria-Romaia if their De Jure territory is compleatly controled by §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_austria_romaia_desc;It is said that once upon a time the lands of the Austrians and the lands of the Hungarians where united as a single Empire
column2: and its Emperor ruled the world. However
column3: since now Hungary doesn't exists
column4: we'll have to make do with what we have on our hands now.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: §YSlovakia§!
column3: §YSlovania§! and §YCroatia§! will become De Jure parts of Austria-Hungary if their De Jure territory is compleatly controled by §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_hungary_austria_desc;It is said that once upon a time the lands of the Hungarians and the lands of the Austrians where united as a single Empire
column2: and its Emperor ruled the world. Whether or not these stories are true
column3: there is no denying how useful such a title will be.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_lusitania_desc;It is said that once upon a time Lusitania was a Great Power
column2: controlling large areas of Iberia without the Spanish threat. Now is the time for us to proclaim our greatness once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_spain_desc;It is said that once upon a time Spain ruled the majority of Iberia. Now is the time for us to restore the great empire once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: a prosperous Chinese empire ruled these wild lands. As we have proven our resilience here
column3: it is now time for us to declare the Tang Dynasty once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: combined forces of evil destroyed the one true Kingdom of Heaven. As we have proven our resilience and conviction
column3: it is now time for us to declare the Heavenly Kingdom once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Crown of Aragon dominated the Mediterranean. As we have proven our resilience and power in this region
column3: it is now time for us to declare Aragon once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the peoples of the South Caucasus unified to form Transcaucasia. But their attempts were in vain
column3: as it collapsed as quickly as it was formed. Now that we have proven our unity and power in this region
column4: it is now time for us to declare Transcaucasia once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: a distant group of "Lusophones" came to India and created a prosperous empire. Although their empire is long gone
column3: their legacy still stood the test of time. Now that we have proven our power in this region
column4: it is now time for us to declare the Konkani Empire once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the ancient Swedes dominated this region
column3: fighting off multiple coalitions wanting its splendor. Although that empire is long gone
column4: their legacy still stood the test of time. Now that we have proven our power in this region
column5: it is now time for us to declare the Swedish Empire once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the ancient Bulgarians dominated this region
column3: even defeating the formidable Romans. Although that empire is long gone
column4: their legacy still stood the test of time. Now that we have gained independence from Yugoslavia
column5: it is now time for us to declare the Bulgarian Empire once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Great Yuan ruled the world from Khanbaliq. Led by Genghis
column3: the Empire brought never before seen prosperity. Soon after his death
column4: civil war erupted
column5: and the frail Yuan Shikai could no longer hold the realm together. Although that empire is long gone
column7: and thus it is now time for us to declare the Yuan Empire once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the ancient peoples of the Baltic united to stand against the invading Russians. Although that empire is long gone
column3: we now have control over the region
column4: and thus it is now time for us to declare the Baltic Union once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the ancient peoples of the North Sea attempted to united under a single banner. Although that idea had been abandoned for ages
column3: we now have control over the region
column4: and thus it is the perfect time to make the Northern Union idea come true!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Persian region were dominated by our ancestors. Although that empire is long gone
column3: we now have control over the region
column4: and thus it is the perfect time to declare the Ilkhanate once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Central Asian Steppes were dominated by our ancestors. Although that empire is long gone
column3: we now have control over the region
column4: and thus it is the perfect time to declare the Chagatai Khanate once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Western Steppes were dominated by our ancestors. Although that empire is long gone
column3: we now have control over the region
column4: and thus it is the perfect time to declare the Golden Horde once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: our forefathers ruled this land with great prosperity. Although that republic is long gone
column3: we now have asserted our dominance and wealth over the region
column4: and thus it is the perfect time to declare the United Arab Emirates once more!;;;;;;;;;x

column2: §YEast Prussia§!
column3: §YWest Prussia§!
column4: §YSilesia§! and §YPosen§! will become De Jure parts of Kingdom of Prussia!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_greater_prussia_desc;It is said that once upon a time Prussia was a Great Empire
column2: controlling all of Northern Germany and vast lands to the west. Thus far all attempts to recreate have been only met with failure and international embarrassment. But perhaps a sufficiently powerful Prussian could finally restore the rightful lands of Prussia?;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_great_russia_desc;The Legends speak of the times long lost where the all the Slavic people stood united under the mighty Great Russia. Perhaps a great enough ruler can bring these times back.;;;;;;;;;x
form_cccp_desc;The Legends speak of the times long lost
column2: where the all the Slavic people stood united under the mighty CCCP and it's great ruler Lord Stalin. Perhaps a great enough ruler can bring these times back.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_mongol_empire_desc;The great legendary Hero Temujin was
column2: at the height of his power betrayed and cast to the Red Menace. Although his loyal followers failed at ever finding him and freeing him from his prison
column3: perhaps a great ruler can instead restore his legacy.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: stalinist_fabricate_evidence_desc;Traitors are everywhere! With enough digging we are sure to find proof of the perfidy of even the most apparently-loyal subject.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the people of India accepted the overlordship of The Queen
column3: and this land was so bountiful that it was graced to be called the Jewel in Her Majesty's Crown. With our conquests of the most crucial cities of India
column4: we can truly claim to be the successors to that great realm.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_european_union_desc;Legends tell of ancient times when all of Europe stood united as one. Perhaps a significantly powerful ruler may bring those times back?.;;;;;;;;;x
form_european_union_tt;§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! restores §Ythe European Union§! Incorporate held European Kingdoms into the Union.;;;;;;;;;x
form_shiv_sena_desc;The Bhagavanist faith has never had a proper holy order dedicated solely to fighting the heretic. If I were powerful enough
column2: I might be able to create such an order
column3: bringing all of the faithful's most zealous warriors together under one banner.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: all Indians were united under a single Hindu Rashtra. If I become powerful enough
column3: I could recreate that great Empire
column4: creating great Bharat again!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_england_desc;In the Antideluvian age before the rise of thelema and the British
column2: The Anglophone people of the British Isles once ruled a mighty and feared kingdom known as England. If we were to become powerfule enough perhaps we could restore it?;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_macedonia_desc;For centuries Macedonia has been torn between warring states. Now with all core lands of Macedonia under the rule of a true Macedonian
column2: I could be able to reunify those lands into the Macedonia of old.;;;;;;;;;x
so that your riders will respect your might.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_gondor_desc;The Kingdom of Gondor was cruelly destroyed by the British invaders. Now that we have retaken Paris
column2: we can reform this great kingdom and begin the reconquest of our native home!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_arnor_desc;The Kingdom of Arnor was lost by the decadence of the Bonaparte family in centuries past
column2: even before the British invaded. Now that we have retaken Marseille
column3: we can truly call ourselves Kings of Arnor once more.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: although described briefly in the Novel
column3: was never a part of Númenor other than one of the many titles of the High King. Now that we have taken the lands we believe to be Harad we can finally crown ourselves their legitimate King!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_numenor;Restore the Crown of The White Tree;;;;;;;;;x
form_numenor_desc;Mighty Númenor once stretched from the Pyrenees to the Polders of Holland. That great Empire spread the Novelist faith throughout the land
column2: but the wicked British utterly destroyed it. Now that we have reclaimed much of our ancient glory
column3: we can once again crown ourselves as High King of Numenor!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: integrate_babylon_desc;Integrate the Kingdom of Babylon into the Empire of Neo-Neo-Assyria.;;;;;;;;;x
integrate_nagaland_desc;Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the Bhutanese bureaucracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.;;;;;;;;;x
integrate_bengal_desc;Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the Bhutanese bureaucracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.;;;;;;;;;x
integrate_bihar_desc;Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the Bhutanese bureaucracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.;;;;;;;;;x
integrate_nepal_desc;Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the Bhutanese bureaucracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.;;;;;;;;;x
form_assyria_desc;For centuries Assyria has been torn between warring states. Now with all core lands of Assyria under the rule of a true Assyrian
column2: I could be able to reunify those lands into the Assyria of old.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_aram_desc;For centuries Aramea has been torn between warring states. Now with all core lands of Aramea under the rule of a true Aramaic
column2: I could be able to reunify those lands into the Aramea of old.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_neo_assyria_desc;Though the Empire of Thoma may have collapsed we can still reclaim the title if we regain the necessary power.;;;;;;;;;x
form_babylon_desc;For centuries Mesopotamia has been torn between warring states. Now with all core lands of Babylon under the rule of a true Mesopotamian
column2: I could be able to reunify those lands into the Babylon of old.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_neo_babylon_desc;With our Babylonian culture reborn and our freedom won from the Assyrians
column2: perhaps it is time for us to form an empire of our own.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_bactria_desc;Long ago a people just like us ruled this land
column2: they too called Hellas their homeland. While they may not be our ancestors
column3: we can claim their title by right of kinship.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_korean_empire_desc;For centuries our people have struggled to survive on the steppe but if we were to unite all of the lands near to our homeland we could perhaps finally exist in peace.;;;;;;;;;x
form_west_korea_tt;§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! creates §YThe Empire of Western Koryo§!.;;;;;;;;;x

form_centcom_desc;In the antideluvian age our ancestors were spread out across this land in a great and mighty organisation. Now that we are powerful ourselves perhaps it is time to reclaim this old title.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: our ancestors were the hegemons of all Europe
column3: now that we have recovered our strength
column4: we can restore the Europabund and our hegemony over Europe.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_lutherstadt_desc;Now that the servants of the Pope have been banished from Germany
column2: we can proclaim a kingdom of Luther
column3: the Lutherstadt.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_kazzinkh_desc;Now that I'm the undisputed master of the Ironist steppes
column2: I can proclaim myself the ruler of a united realm.;;;;;;;;;x
I can draw on ancient Irish mythology to forge a new empire
column3: the land of the young
column4: or Tír na nÓg;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_latin_empire_desc;We shall collect the core lands of this ancient empire
column2: and raise the ancient banners of the Latin Empire.;;;;;x

column1: restore_latin_empire_TT;Become the Emperor of the §YLatin Empire§!;;;;;;x
restore_byzantine_empire_desc;I will gather the crown lands of Byzantium
column2: and raise the old banners of Rome once more.;;;;;x

column1: restore_byzantine_empire_TT;Become the Emperor of the §YByzantine Empire§!;;;;;;x
form_imperium_desc;Now that we have risen to a place of great prominence as a people we shall declare a great empire to rival that of Rome!;;;;;;;;;x
form_k_mann_desc;Now that we rule great stretches of land it is only right and just for our people to have a kingdom to call our own.;;;;;;;;;x
form_north_sea;Form the Governate of the North Sea;;;;;;;;;x
form_north_sea_desc;Now that we rule all of the Feroes perhaps it is right that we stretch Brwtysh influence across the north sea?;;;;;;;;;x
form_north_sea_tt;§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! creates §YThe Governate of the North Sea§!.;;;;;;;;;x
form_hospitaller_state_desc;Our Order has grown so far and wide it makes sense that we require a reorganisation of our system to handle all of our holdings.;;;;;;;;;x
form_sepulchre_state_desc;Our Order has grown so far and wide it makes sense that we require a reorganisation of our system to handle all of our holdings.;;;;;;;;;x
form_tectonic_state_desc;Our Order has grown so far and wide it makes sense that we require a reorganisation of our system to handle all of our holdings.;;;;;;;;;x
form_kgb_state_desc;Our Order has grown so far and wide it makes sense that we require a reorganisation of our system to handle all of our holdings.;;;;;;;;;x
form_rome_desc;In the ancient past our people were part of a great empire that spanned the known world
column2: If we were to control key regions of this ancient antideluvian empire we could claim its mantle.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_venice;Form the most Serene Republic of Venice;;;;;;;;;x
form_venice_desc;Once in the distant past our people held a great republic in this land
column2: as the inheritors of that tradition we hold the right to just as much grandure.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_venice_tt;§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! creates §YThe most Serene Republic of Venice§!.;;;;;;;;;x
form_hansa_desc;Once in the distant past our people held a great republic in this land
column2: as the inheritors of that tradition we hold the right to just as much grandure.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_roman_republic_desc;Once in the distant past our people held a great republic in this land
column2: as the inheritors of that tradition we hold the right to just as much grandure.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_russian_republic_desc;Once in the distant past our people held a great republic in this land
column2: as the inheritors of that tradition we hold the right to just as much grandure.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_atlantis_desc;We shall claim the mantle of the mythological Atlantians and spread our glory across the world!;;;;;;;;;x
form_ladins_desc;We shall unite these lands into a kingdom for the Romansch people
column2: Rumantschia.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_normandy_desc;We shall unite our people into a great kingdom
column2: Normandy.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_burgundy_desc;We shall unite our people into a great kingdom
column2: Burgundy.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_genoa;Form the most Serene Republic of Genoa;;;;;;;;;x
form_genoa_desc;Once in the distant past our people held a great republic in this land
column2: as the inheritors of that tradition we hold the right to just as much grandure.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_genoa_tt;§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! creates §YThe most Serene Republic of Genoa§!.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: but laid waste under the dire transnistrians. Now that their shackles are no longer binding us
column3: we need to reclaim our destiny!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_the_hre_OW_desc;Long ago in the antideluvian age there was a great empire that united all of central Europe and northern Italy. If we were to somehow reunite this vast territory we could reclaim this mantle for ourselves.;;;;;;;;;x
form_zion_desc;Tsion is the concept of Israel at its height
column2: with internal turmoil rocking the Kingdom for the last 150 years
column3: many clamour for the restoration of the "golden era" of the Jewish people. Now that we have taken control of the territories of Israel at its peak
column4: we are in prime position to fulfill the concept of Tsion and firmly put ourselves on the world stage as a power to be reckoned with.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we can request Beijing to grant us the Mandate of the West and give us the authorization to expand further outwards
column3: the world will learn the ways of the Chairman
column4: one way or another.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_ulm_desc;If I were to become wealthy and prestigious enough I could declare myself to be the Prince of Ulm.;;;;;;;;;x
form_franconia_desc;If I were to become wealthy and prestigious enough I could declare myself to be the inheritor of the ancient antideluvian kingdom of Franconia.;;;;;;;;;x
donate_money_to_legion_of_mary_desc;Donate money to the Legion of Mary in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.;;;;;;;;;x
donate_money_to_legion_of_mary;Donate 300¤ to the Legion of Mary;.;;;;;;;;;x
donate_money_to_knights_lazarus_desc;Donate money to the Knights of St Lazarus in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.;;;;;;;;;x
donate_money_to_knights_lazarus;Donate 300¤ to the Knights of St Lazarus;.;;;;;;;;;x
donate_money_to_columbus_knights_desc;Donate money to the Columbus Knights in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.;;;;;;;;;x
donate_money_to_carmelites_desc;Donate money to the Carmalites in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.;;;;;;;;;x
expel_the_legion_of_mary_desc;I can drive the Legion of Marry from my realm and seize their castles. However
column2: it is a very impious thing to do...;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: expelled_d_knights_lazarus;Expelled the Knights of St Lazarus;;;;;;;;;;x
expel_the_knights_lazarus;Expel the Knights of St Lazarus;;;;;;;;;;x
expel_the_knights_lazarus_desc;I can drive the Knights of St Lazarus from my realm and seize their castles. However
column2: it is a very impious thing to do...;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: expel_montesa_desc;I can drive the Order of Montesa from my realm and seize their castles. However
column2: it is a very impious thing to do...;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: donate_money_to_montesa_desc;Donate money to the Order of Montesa in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.;;;;;;;;;x
donate_money_to_montesa;Donate 300¤ to the Order of Montesa.;;;;;;;;;x

convert_to_oligarchic_republic_indep_desc;Founding a Oligarchic Republic will convert all my Tribal Holdings into Cities. Where this occurs - if the County is big enough - Castle and Temple Holdings will also be created if they do not already exist.;;;;;;;;;x
expel_one_holy_order_desc;I can drive [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] from my realm and seize their castles. However
column2: it is a very impious thing to do...;Je peux expulser [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] de mon pays et m'emparer de leurs commanderies. Ce serait par contre un acte des plus impies...;Ich kann [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] aus meinem Reich vertreiben und ihre Burgen beschlagnahmen. Allerdings wäre das leider nicht sehr fromm ...;;Puedo manejar [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] de mi reino y arrebatarles sus castillos. No obstante
column3: eso sería una acción muy impía...;;;;;;;;;x

column1: donate_money_to_one_holy_order_desc;Donate money to [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.;Il est possible de donner de l'argent à [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] en échange de piété. Cet acte augmentera également le respect de l'Église [Root.Religion.GetName] envers vous.;Ich kann [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder] Geld spenden und erhalte dafür Pietät und den lebenslangen Respekt der [Root.Religion.GetName]e Kirche.;;Puedo hacer una donación a [Root.GetReligionsOneHolyOrder]. A cambio obtendré la Piedad y el respeto de por vida de la Iglesia [Root.Religion.GetName].;;;;;;;;;x
expel_two_holy_order_desc;I can drive [Root.GetReligionsTwoHolyOrder] from my realm and seize their castles. However
column2: it is a very impious thing to do...;Je peux expulser [Root.GetReligionsTwoHolyOrder] de mon pays et m'emparer de leurs commanderies. Ce serait par contre un acte des plus impies...;Ich kann [Root.GetReligionsTwoHolyOrder] aus meinem Reich vertreiben und ihre Burgen beschlagnahmen. Allerdings wäre das leider nicht sehr fromm ...;;Puedo manejar [Root.GetReligionsTwoHolyOrder] de mi reino y arrebatarles sus castillos. No obstante
column3: eso sería una acción muy impía...;;;;;;;;;x

column1: donate_money_to_two_holy_order_desc;Donate money to [Root.GetReligionsTwoHolyOrder] in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.;Il est possible de donner de l'argent à [Root.GetReligionsTwoHolyOrder] en échange de piété. Cet acte augmentera également le respect de l'Église [Root.Religion.GetName] envers vous.;Ich kann [Root.GetReligionsTwoHolyOrder] Geld spenden und erhalte dafür Pietät und den lebenslangen Respekt der [Root.Religion.GetName]e Kirche.;;Puedo hacer una donación a [Root.GetReligionsTwoHolyOrder]. A cambio obtendré la Piedad y el respeto de por vida de la Iglesia [Root.Religion.GetName].;;;;;;;;;x
didnt_tried_to_construct_castle_tt;Didn't try to construct castle in the last year.;;;;;;;;;x
didnt_tried_to_construct_castle_this_tt;[Root.Holder.GetTitledFirstName] didn't refuse castle construction in the last ten years.;;;;;;;;;x
isnt_expelled_tt;Isn't expelled from the realm of [Root.Holder.GetTitledFirstName];;;;;;;;;x

column2: you can request to construct a castle in the realms of [From.Religion.GetName] lords.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: chaldean_catholic_reunion;Re-enter communion with the Catholic church;;;;;;;;;x
chaldean_catholic_reunion_desc;In the ancient past several of our constituant churches were in communion with the pope in rome. Perhaps it is time we returned to his flock.;;;;;;;;;x
neovedic_artifact_search_desc;The Fifth Veda tells legends about many artifacts. A pious Neovedic ruler can begin the search for them anytime
column2: if they don't already have one.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: orange_nassau_restored_desc;Ever since the fall of our cousins House Belgium-Oranje-Nassau-Weilburg to novelism during the fall of the Beneluxian empire we of the house Oranje-Nassau have been the only branch left christian. The last member of our dynasty during the fall was a member of the Knights Hospitaller. As he is now grandmaster if we were to reclaim the Netherlands for Calvinism the order would easily accept the grandmaster abdicating to become the king of the Netherlands and would serve him as they did in the antideluvian age.;;;;;;;;;x
claim_to_be_mikraist_messiah_desc;After laborious study of the Mikrah
column2: Talmud and Zohar
column3: and gathering the approval of religious authorities. I can finally proclaim myself the Mashiach ben Yosef
column4: the true Messiah of the Jewish people.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: I can buy a prized relic from this person;;;;;;;;;x

column1: choose_jewish_school_desc;Choose a past inspiration from Jewish history;;;;;;;;;x
choose_anglican_branch_desc;Choose a denomination of the Anglican faith.;;;;;;;;;x
choose_jewish_school_desc;Choose one of the sects of Ma'aravi Judaism to identify with.;;;;;;;;;x
choose_vagarna_branch_desc;Choose a branch of the Vagarna faith;;;;;;;;;x
study_american_philosophy_desc;You can choose to study an aspect of American philosophy that will affect your governance for the next few years.;;;;;;;;;x
choose_jadidist_sympathy_desc;Choose another faith to sympathize with.;;;;;;;;;x
choose_vagarna_branch_desc;Choose a Zarist cult to join.;;;;;;;;;x
choose_hasidic_sect_desc;Join one of the major Hasidic sects prevalent across the United States.;;;;;;;;;x
launch_jacobinist_revolution_desc;You may play with the fabric of time and launch a Jacobinist Revolution somewhere in the world.;;;;;;;;;x
launch_jacobinist_revolution_tt;Has at least 4 counties in a kingdom
column2: which he holds or doesn't have a holder.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: vassalize_palmarian_papacy_desc;The Palmarian religion's core is in the Iberian Peninsula
column2: therefore the emperor of Spain can have a huge influence in religious matters too. A pietious emperor with a litle gift could convince the pope to swear fealty to them.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: borrow_money_jews_america_desc;I can borrow 300¤ from Arhavi Merchants and moneylenders living in the local ports that have come from the far off land of Amr-ika.;;;;;;;;;x
repay_money_jews_america_desc;I will repay the gold that I owe the Arhavi moneylenders.;;;;;;;;;x
employ_a_bhutan_gunsmith_desc;I can hire a gunsmith to produce a quality firearm for me to use in battle.;;;;;;;;;x
employ_a_kybur_gunsmith_desc;I can hire a gunsmith from the Kybur pass to produce a firearm for me to use in battle.;;;;;;;;;x
employ_a_european_gunsmith_desc;I can hire a gunsmith to produce a firearm for me to use in battle.;;;;;;;;;x
become_a_gentleman_thief_desc;I will follow in the steps of the great Hooded Robin and Arsène the Lupin and fight back against the corrupt and evil through daring acts of theft.;;;;;;;;;x
hold_tiger_hunt_europe_desc;Tiger hunting is a noble sport but also an occasion to meet your vassals to forge bonds of friendship and discuss important business. Though believed to not be native
column2: tigers appeared in Europe after the event.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: produce_penicillin_desc;I shall use my great antideluvian knowledge to create wonderous ancient medicine.;;;;;;;;;x
take_bhutanese_exam_desc;In Bhutan as a memeber of the aristocracy you are expected to take an exam to be qualified as a Beuracrat.;;;;;;;;;x
send_imperial_support_desc;As the Emperor of the Thunder Dragon Empire I will provide large scale financial support to my friends and allies outside of Bhutan.;;;;;;;;;x
present_bachelor_desc;A young nobleman who has caught your eye makes his début at a formal ball.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
